milestones.description: de Mel and Ratnayeke's 29-run partnership is SL's highest for the 7th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 28 between de Mel and Wettimuny
de Mel and de Silva's 56-run partnership is SL's highest for the 8th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 29 between de Silva and Wettimuny
